articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Venezuela
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Venezuela 
    Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's immortal famous work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification" was brought out in pamphlet by the Canta Claro Publishing House in Venezuela.
 The work, published on August 4, Juche 86 (1997), deals with the immortal feats performed by President Kim Il Sung for the cause of national reunification. The three principles of national reunification, the proposal for establishing the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo and the ten-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation for the reunification of the country are formulated as the three charters for national reunification in the work.

Greetings to Emir of Qatar
articles.content:
Greetings to Emir of Qatar
    Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Hamad Bin Khalifa Al-Thani, emir of the State of Qatar, on September 1 on the occasion of the 33rd anniversary of its independence.
 The message extended warm greetings to the emir, the government and people of Qatar on this occasion.    
 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to develop on good terms, the message wished him good health and happiness as well as the friendly Qatari people progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Agreement on Mutual Juridical Assistance between DPRK and Yemen
articles.content:
Agreement on Mutual Juridical Assistance between DPRK and Yemen
    Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- An agreement on  mutual juridical assistance in civil and criminal cases between the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and the Republic of Yemen was signed here today.
 Present at the signing ceremony were members of a juridical delegation of the DPRK led by First Deputy Justice of the Central Court Yun Myong Guk from the DPRK side and members of a juridical delegation of Yemen led by Vice-Minister of Justice Mohamed Jaffer Kassim from the other side.

Kim Jong Il Receives Gift from Chinese Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Receives Gift from Chinese Delegation
    Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a gift from the visiting delegation of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.
 The gift was conveyed to President of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly Kim Yong Nam today by Vice-Chairman of the National Committee of CPPCC Li Zhaozhuo who is heading the delegation.
